parts.name: Leaf Angle
parts.description: Leaf angle refers to the angle at which leaves are attached to the stem. This trait affects light capture and canopy architecture.

parts.name: Plant Height
parts.description: Plant height is a critical agronomic trait that affects plant architecture, lodging resistance, and yield potential.

parts.name: Tassel
parts.description: The tassel is the male inflorescence of the maize plant, located at the top of the plant. It produces pollen for fertilization.
